tool_description: Cancels active orders on trading venues, handling both individual and bulk cancellation requests with confirmation.

order_ids.description: List of venue order IDs to cancel

connection_ids.description: List of active connection IDs corresponding to order venues

cancel_all_for_symbol.description: Whether to cancel all orders for the symbols in the order list

error_messages: Order not cancellable: One or more orders cannot be cancelled (already filled or cancelled).
Connection invalid: One or more connection IDs are not active or expired.
Cancellation rejected: Venue rejected the cancellation request.
Order ID mismatch: Number of order IDs must match number of connection IDs unless using cancel_all_for_symbol.
usage: Provide arrays of order IDs and corresponding connection IDs. Set cancel_all_for_symbol to true for symbol-based bulk cancellation.

cancelled_orders.description: List of successfully cancelled order IDs

failed_cancellations.description: List of order IDs that could not be cancelled
